title: Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Roh Moo-hyun of the Republic of Korea | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 23, 2009

 



Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Roh Moo-hyun of the Republic of Korea




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary    ___________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                 May 23, 2009   Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Roh Moo-hyun of the Republic of Korea   I was saddened by the news of the death of former President Roh Moo-hyun of the Republic of Korea.  During his tenure, President Roh contributed to the strong and vital relationship between the United States and the Republic of Korea. On behalf of government of the United States, I offer my condolences to his family and to the Korean people.  ###
